title: S. mutans and S. sanguinis compete 1

content.question: Identify the biochemical pathway S. mutans uses for metabolizing sugar and describe how the pathway contributes to the low pH in the inner layers of plaque.

frqParts.text: Identify the biochemical pathway S. mutans uses for metabolizing sugar and describe how the pathway contributes to the low pH in the inner layers of plaque.

skill.text: 1.C: Explain biological concepts and processes in applied contexts.
